name: Dine 'n Dash
description:
*Full Screen Recommended*

-Press Z to pick up customers or condiments and to put them at a table.

-Hold Z next to a table to move it around while not holding customers.

-Press X to drop customers.

Dine 'n Dash is a game about seating customers at a restaurant. Can you survive a never ending rush of naggy customers?

I made this game because I work at a restaurant part time and thought the stress and decision making of a busy night could make an interesting game. Enjoy!

Made for GMTK Jam 2019. Art, Design, and Coding by Thomas Keys.  Music by audionautix.com
